channel.title: Please someone answer me!
channel.description:
someone help me compiling my server, because when i try to compile it says:
1.- java its not recognized 2.- jdk its not installed (but i already installed it)
i didnt set my enviormental variables, because when i set them i cant run any client, but if i set them... still cant compile
what i can do? please someone help me
thanks

item.title: Please someone answer me!
item.dc:creator: @abraham3 abraham3

i try to make compiler as the same version of my java but still dont works, and okey im going to search for some variables

and search around and try to find some variables. yours might not be right. if it still dosent work try making the compiler the same version as your java.

item.title: Please someone answer me!
item.dc:creator: @abraham3 abraham3
item.description:
@abraham3 wrote:

[quote=“chris lol, post:3, topic:220611”]try using this compiler instead.

@echo off COLOR 09 title project X16 comiler javac *.java pause[/quote]

it says “javac” its not recognized
